mapper.select: SELECT item_detail_no_pk as itemDetailNoPK, fk_item__item_detail as fkItemItemDetail, item_detail_name as itemDetailName, item_detail_product_grade as itemDetailProductGrade, item_detail_unit as itemDetailUnit, item_detail_term as itemDetailTerm, item_detail_limit as itemDetailLimit, item_detail_admin as itemDetailAdmin, item_detail_date as itemDetailDate FROM item_detail
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_buy ( order_buy_pk, fk_consumer__order_buy, fk_item_detail__order_buy, order_buy_consumer_name, order_buy_method, order_buy_per_price, order_buy_amount, order_buy_date, order_buy_final_pay_date ) VALUES ( #{order_buy_pk}, #{fk_consumer__order_buy}, (SELECT item_detail_no_pk FROM item_detail WHERE item_detail_name=#{fk_item_detail__order_buy}), (SELECT consumer_name FROM consumer WHERE consumer_id_pk=#{order_buy_consumer_name}), substr(#{order_buy_method},2), #{order_buy_per_price}, #{order_buy_amount}, now(), date_add(now(), interval +3 month) );
